abstract: Target is going bananas to keep up with Wal-Mart Stores, not to mention that the struggle has brought activist investor William Ackman down on its back.
snippet: Target is going bananas to keep up with Wal-Mart Stores, not to mention that the struggle has brought activist investor William Ackman down on its back.
lead_paragraph: Target is going bananas to keep up with Wal-Mart Stores, not to mention that the struggle has brought activist investor William Ackman down on its back.

headline.main: As It Battles Ackman and Wal-Mart, Target Pushes Basics
